text: Christina El Moussa became a celeb as one of the stars of HGTV ’ s hit show “ Flip or Flop. ” Rumors have been swirling that Christina El Moussa could be headed to the “ Real Housewives ” franchise, but a source with knowledge of the situation told Fox News the “ Flip or Flop ” star hasn ’ t been in touch with Bravo execs. OK Magazine reported earlier this month that Bravo was hoping to get El Moussa on “ The Real Housewives of Orange County. ” But so far, nothing is in the works, Fox News has learned. “ Christina is currently focused on filming new episodes of ‘ Flip or Flop ’ and has not been approached by Bravo executives, ” a source told us.
